data.eml:eml: Three new species of Empoasca (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae: Empoascini) from northern South America

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Southern, Phillip Sterling (2006): Three new species of Empoasca (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae: Empoascini) from northern South America. Zootaxa 1314: 41-51, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173930
